text: The SAP CC Batch UDR types are designed to formalize the exchange between workflows and the SAP Convergent Charging Core Server. The SAP CC agents translate the response into a charging or acquisition result UDR, which is referred to by a CCBatchCycleUDR that becomes available in the workflow. The SAP CC Batch UDR types can be viewed in the UDR Internal Format Browser in the sapcc folder, in the batch subfolder. To open the browser, open an APL Editor, and, in the editing area, right -click an d select UDR Assistance . The section contains the following subsections: Batch Answer Batch Request CCBatchCycleUDR
title: SAP CC Batch UDRs - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
